'''1.7.7''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on April 9, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6/|title=Minecraft 1.7.8|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=April 9, 2014}}</ref> to fix some crashes in some multiplayer servers from [[Java Edition 1.7.6|1.7.6]]. It is compatible with 1.7.6 servers.

1.7.7 was reuploaded a day later on April 10, 2014, to remove the message <code>Outdated server! pretending to be 1.7.7</code>.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed some crashes for some multiplayer servers.<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|453921942320734210|We updated Minecraft to 1.7.7 to fix some nasty crashes.|April 9, 2014}}</ref></onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This is one of the only five Minecraft versions to end with 1.x.7, the other ones being [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.7|1.0.7]] (2010), [[Java Edition 1.4.7|1.4.7]] (2013), [[Java Edition 1.8.7|1.8.7]] (2015), and [[Java Edition 1.21.7|1.21.7]] (2025).
